description.text: Attacks with a giant sword, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. After using this skill, has a 25% chance to activate Smash as an extra attack. Chance to activate Smash is doubled when the enemy is buffed.
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、50%の確率で攻撃力DOWNを1ターンの間付与する。スキル使用後、25%の確率で【破砕】が発動する。対象が強化状態の場合、【破砕】の発動率が2倍になる。

description.text: Attacks the enemy repeatedly with a giant sword, with a 80% chance to dispel all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to number of buffs granted to the caster.
description.multipliers:
ATK*1.5*1*1.871 
                                        
                                                                                    Att_rate increases by 0.07 per buff beyond 1 (0.07 at 2 buffs, 0.14 at 3 buffs, etc)
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、80%の確率で対象の強化効果をすべて解除する。自身の強化効果の数が多いほどダメージがUPする。

description.text: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns. Additionally increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.
description.burn: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn. (-10 Souls)
description.multipliers:
ATK*1.2*1*1.871
                                        
                                                                                    53.4%/80.1%/106.8% more damage vs 3/2/1 target respectively
description.text_ja: 敵全体に攻撃し、味方全体に攻撃力UPを2ターンの間付与する。更に自身に防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。対象が3人以下の場合、対象が少ないほどダメージがUPする。
description.burn_ja: このスキルによる強化効果の持続ターンが1UPする。(魂力10消費)
